meanings.definition: To lie exposed to warmth and light, typically from the sun
meanings.sent1: The lizard was basking on the rock in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The cat enjoys basking in the sunlight by the window.
meanings.sent3: The lazy dog was basking in the sun, feeling like a king.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were basking in the sunlight, soaking up its energy.
meanings.sent5: The turtle was basking on the log, its shell glistening in the sun.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or satisfaction in something
meanings.sent1: She was basking in the praise she received for her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The child was basking in the joy of playing with their new toy.
meanings.sent3: The team was basking in the victory, celebrating their win.
meanings.sent4: He was basking in the success of his hard work paying off.
meanings.sent5: The author was basking in the positive reviews of their latest book.
